variants.p: Some respondents requested clarification of whether they could apply the proposed practical expedient if the amount of the contributions depended on the employee’s age instead of the number of years of service (age-based contributions). The IASB observed that examples illustrating the proposed practical expedient in ED/2013/4 implied two criteria—one is whether contributions are a fixed percentage of salary and the other is whether the contributions are independent of the number of years of service.
